## Science Communication Resources

-   [Science Communication Resources](https://500womenscientists.org/science-communication-resources) - _Wide-ranging advice about science communication from a US non-profit - LP_
-   [Ten simple rules for scientists engaging in science communication](https://journals.plos.org/ploscompbiol/article?id=10.1371/journal.pcbi.1011251) - _One of the many great "ten simple rules" articles from PLoS Comp. Biol. - LP_
-   [Ten simple rules for drawing scientific comics](https://journals.plos.org/ploscompbiol/article?id=10.1371/journal.pcbi.1005845) - _Unleash your budding Gary Larson - LP_
-   [Ten Simple Rules for Effective Online Outreach](https://journals.plos.org/ploscompbiol/article?id=10.1371/journal.pcbi.1003906) - _Broader in scope than just your project, but worth keeping in mind if you're looking at a career in science - LP_
-   [How to Eliminate Jargon From Science Communication](https://asm.org/Articles/Policy/2021/October-21/How-to-Eliminate-Jargon-From-Science-Communication) - _I don't believe jargon can be entirely eliminated (it's precise language), but there's no reason to be obscure - LP_
